structure.unit: Sec. 5-2002. - FUNCTIONS AND DUTIES OF THE DEPARTMENT.

law.catch_line: FUNCTIONS AND DUTIES OF THE DEPARTMENT.

text.section: Inspection of fire safety devices and equipment, constructions and obstructions;
Enforcement of fire prevention codes; instruction in the correction of violations and when necessary the correction of violations through the courts as a final action;
Responding to all calls, fire or rescue and the suppression of all fires as found;
Training the City's firefighting force in fire suppression, rescues and in equipment apparatus and operations; and

Supervising the upkeep of all fire stations, engine companies, truck companies, and auxiliary vehicles, including the testing and maintenance of fire hydrants. Charter reference: Fire Department, ยง6.24 State law reference: Fire protection, G.S. 160A, Article 14
